Work

Here is a list of cool things I have had a hand in. You can also see some code if you visit my github profile. Check out my résumé and or professional timeline.

Hospitium – an animal shelter management system built with Rails. Source code on github.
Imago – a website thumbnails service. Source code on github. This thumbnail is served using imago.
Downedcloud – enter SoundCloud URL -> get mp3. Simple.. Source code on github.
Homkora – a time tracking app built with CakePHP. Source code on github.

Site built for Tuna Bites from Fresh Gourmet.

Simple HTML theme released for free. Source on github.

Web site designed and built for AppleWood Rescue using a modified Cohhe theme.

Custom site built and designed for Larraz Building Excellence, in collaboration with Creative 303.

Gentleman WordPress theme designed, developed, and released as a free download. WARNING - This theme is really old and no longer maintained. Use at own risk.

Dark Wood WordPress theme designed, developed, and released as a free download. WARNING - This theme is really old and no longer maintained. Use at own risk.
